attacks.name: Rapid Spin
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any. You switch Donphan with 1 of your Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Bash In
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 damage plus 60 more damage.
